channel.title: New server is comming... Lots of Staff wanted! All get admin/mod on server
channel.description:
Ok, as most know, i Own AdventureScape. We need Alot staff... Well, here is the list: Forum: www.asforums.smfforfree2.com
[center][b]---Forum deveopers---[/b][/center] Will be required to Help make the forum, Make ideas, Moderate the forum with Our Moderation team. Positions: ~de_bugger~ ~Lin~ ~Ryan12~ ~Open~ ~Open~ ~Open~
[center][b]Server Coders[/b][/center] Will be required to Help code our server...... Positions: ~Lin~ ~Fr33sc4p3~ ~Pk3r kyle~ ~sonjichan ~ ~Ryan12~ ~Open~
[center][b]Support Crew[/b][/center] Will be required to Help with people who need help, And deal with Ban Appeals. Positios: ~de_bugger~ ~sonjichan~ ~Ryan12~ ~Open~
[center][b]AdventureScape Moderation Team[/b][/center] Will be required to moderate the boards of AS. (adventurescape) Positions: ~Ryan12~ ~Open~ ~Open~ ~Open~ ~Open~
[center][b]Design And Arts[/b][/center]
~Open~ ~Open~ ~Open~ ~Open~ ~Open~ If you would like one of those positions, Please post and i will add your name. All applicants will recive admin or mod status in the Game when it is finished! thanks ikick
Almost forgot, www.adventure.smfforfree2.com i am in the middle of buying a domain!! (adventurescape.com)

item.dc:creator: @guthans guthans
item.description:
@guthans wrote:

didnt have time to sign up for forums but im willing to deal with bann appeals and thats all. i am mainly on from 3:30pm-9:00pm on school days and 12:00pm-2:00am weekends. the only thing i will do is help people who are having problems. banning people and unbanning, checking up and seeing if all npc’s are commanding right, and tons more… if you have any questions please just post here.

Read full topic

item.title: New server is comming... Lots of Staff wanted! All get admin/mod on server
item.dc:creator: @sonjichan sonjichan
item.description:
@sonjichan wrote:

Usman. Fix this code snippet. Find the error and repair it.

[code]public vood RefreshSummonBook() {

sendQuest("", 963);
sendQuest("", 8934);
sendQuest("", 6272);
sendQuest("", 6271);
sendQuest("", 9926);
sendQuest(“off”, 936);
sendQuest(“on”, 935);
sendQuest(“Summoning Spells:”, 5450);
sendQuest("", 4439);
//Start of music list
}[/code]

if you can fix that he’ll probably consider you for coding.

Read full topic

I can be contacted at my msn cripz_babe@hotmail.com i am online 24/7,I hope you give me all the positions there are and i will show you that i can live up to them with no problem.;)[/quote]
